General.Name: Pantera Silver Corp
General.Description: Pantera Silver Corp. operates as a mineral exploration company. It holds interest in the Nuevo Taxco Silver-Gold project that covers an area of approximately 1,100 hectares located in the Pregones Mining District, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Red Oak Mining Corp. and changed its name to Pantera Silver Corp. in March 2021. Pantera Silver Corp. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: Pacific Centre, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7Y 1G5
